com.netflix.servo.util
Class Counters

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.servo.util.Counters

public final class Counters
extends Object

Helper class for basic counters that can be actively updated and tagged based on context. When one of the increment methods is called a counter will be created automatically if one does not already exist and registered with the DefaultMonitorRegistry.

Method Summary

          Increment the counter with the given config.
